website_summaries.verdict: A firm, sturdy, and durable mattress that is easy to inflate. Comes with stylish bed skirt and fitted sheet providing an extra layer of comfort.
pros: Stylish addition of bed skirt and fitted sheet, provides an extra layer to capture warmth and provides extra comfort
Packs down into handy drawstring carry bag with shoulder strap
cons: It will lose air if in constant use

customer_reviews.title: Will purchase another for guests 😊
customer_reviews.text: Amazing bed!!!!! You will not go wrong with this!! Take into consideration I'm using it as a actual everyday bed with my son who is 3 and does nothing but jump on it lol
customer_reviews.author: Jaz

customer_reviews.title: From seller to snoozing, 100 stars!
customer_reviews.text: First, the customer service from this company(Becky is amazing!!)shined like the sun!! Incredible and beyond noteworthy!! Thank you! The air bed. Its a KING which is actually verrry difficult to find! Love the cover, makes me feel more secure, since 3 of our cats are always in bed with us! Nice colour, i cant stand basic beige anything! No smell, fast and easy from box to blown up bed. Its been up for about 2 weeks and its just now starting to feel like we might need to top it off with a bit more air. Overall, fantastic from purchase to performance. Finally something thats not great at either seller or item. This has high quality on both! 100 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Moxxie

customer_reviews.title: Comparing to a queen
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! No one has slept on it yet, but seems comparable to other good air mattresses. You can see here how it compares to the Coleman queen size! Definitely bigger. I like how there is a slight lip that goes all the way around instead of curving down. Company coming soon and if there is any thing different to report, I will come back and amend.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne H.

customer_reviews.title: looking for a cute comfortable air mattress?
customer_reviews.text: I had issues when I first got it but I contacted Fox BEST customer service you can't go wrong with them! They had another mattress delivered to me in a few days. this mattress is exactly as described...This is cute and comfortable I even overslept on my new mattress lol..:)
customer_reviews.author: Delaware Mom

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Nice Looking
customer_reviews.text: As blow up beds go, it would be hard to top this. Sometimes you just need extra space for guests, but your guests are adults. This is surprisingly comfortable and it is high enough off the ground that an adult has an easy time getting up. I really like the bedskirt; it just makes it look a little better. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SoozeSays

customer_reviews.title: Holds air all night and firmness is adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I had 2 other king air mattresses and neither held air. Purchased this one and it held air all night and was so far superior to any air mattresses that I’ve seen before. Even has a mattress cover with bedskirt.
customer_reviews.author: Jab

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I got a defective product on my first order but was promptly replaced by the vendor. Excellent customer service! I got the queen size and so far it holds up fine as per my dad who weighs 270 lbs and my mom 150 lbs. In terms of firmness, I think it is very sturdy I had to buy an additional softer mattress pad to cover. But overall the mattress meets the product description. It’s one of the great value quality products I’ve ever purchased on Amazon I should say. I also like the included fitted mattress cover!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: First air mattress I don't hate.
customer_reviews.text: I have been sleeping on it for the past 2 weeks, have not had to refill it once yet. That is a first for an air mattress in my life. Pro tip: if you plan to sleep on it for prolonged periods of time, get a foam top, it will feel like a proper bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress!
customer_reviews.text: I got no complains about this mattress. I've been using it for guest for 2 years now. Still works just as the day I bought it. The fitted sheet is truly beautiful. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and comfortable queen size air mattress.
customer_reviews.text: We are using this mattress as a temporary bed while having some remodeling done on our home. The fitted sheet with bed skirt make the air mattress a lot more attractive and more bed like which I love! The ease of inflation is really helpful. I’m just not sure when it is fully inflated. Is there a set number of minutes or is just the feel and eyeballing it sufficient? The first couple of days were super comfortable for sleeping but now it seems to have developed ridges when inflated...it this normal? Anyway it we love it and will purchase the queen size again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than any bed, ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is an exceptional product. We purchased after losing our home in the firestorms and had nothing. It saved us and we have continued to enjoy the bed for almost 2 years. It has rarely needed any re-inflation and is more comfortable than any bed we have ever owned. The inflation pump is extremely easy and high quality. It takes seconds to inflate or deflate too. Would not hesitate to recommend or purchase again!!
customer_reviews.author: E W

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two air mattress around the same time, this one from Amazon and another from Target and this was hands down the better of the two. Incredibly comfortable. No air seeping or constant need to reinflate. I loved that everything was built-in so there were no nozzles or pieces to attach to switch from one function to another. The bedskirt was an added touch that made my guest feel like they were sleeping on a regular mattress. Deflating was relatively seamless as was getting the mattress back into the box. Definitely worth the money and a good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquetta Williams

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: My 6' 4" football player brother-in-law slept on it over the holiday weekend and gave it two thumbs up. It inflated quickly, stayed inflated all night and he said it was extremely comfortable. Glad to have it on hand for future guests.
customer_reviews.author: Jenfa

customer_reviews.title: Fast, firm and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The mattress is a good value. It inflated easily. I took a couple of very comfortable test naps while awaiting arrival of guests. The fitted sheet and bed skirt are a nice added touch.Fa
customer_reviews.author: Stephen B. Kimmell

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress for an extended visit (14 nights).
customer_reviews.text: Slept on it for 14 nights and it really only needed air added once. It was a bit firmer than I would have liked for me but my partner liked the firmness.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Its a lovely bed
customer_reviews.text: So far....no seams have opened which is the single most annoying problem with air beds. Even when you try to patch them. Ultimately they will fail. This bed emphasized constructing its seams to prevent this problem. It doesn't really pay to go cheap. It comes with a cover with a bed skirt attached. Looks very nice. Its an ideal spare bed.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: This air mattress is the real deal.
customer_reviews.text: Slept on my new air mattress last night. In fact, I over-slept, but today I feel like a new man. This air mattress is the real deal. It replaced an expensive solid mattress and box that wore out in less than two years (I'm not over-weight). Will report back if I have any issues (beyond my tomcat's claws).
customer_reviews.author: Allen B. Walker

customer_reviews.title: no air loss with this comfortable bed.
customer_reviews.text: had this bed inflated for several days to get it prepared for company. Despite rolling on it and getting in and out of it several time, it never seemed to loose any air at all. The only possible complaint is that it really isn't as easy to fold and get back into the bag as I hoped. This may have something to do with the fact that my husband refused to let the pump extract all the air and tried doing this the old way, laying on it and rolling to get the air out. Next time we will try my way LOL.
customer_reviews.author: Shayla Covey

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: Used for guest room. Very satisfied with purchase despite the fact that there was no headboard like my previous purchase. Stayed firm for 72 hours. No air leaks, No need to pump air after initial setup. Only con: there is no auto-stop mechanism. You have to stay by the mattress until it seems fully inflated. I could be wrong on using the feature for the first time,, but the air kept on pumping non-stop.
customer_reviews.author: RaffU

customer_reviews.title: Fully satisfied with full size air mattress!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of the full size air mattresses. I am amazed at how comfortable they are. The height was higher than I expected! The sheets I bought for the beds fit perfectly. I am very pleased with this product. I purchased these mattresses for my grandchildren age 12 and 16 years old. They are extremely happy with their new beds. The fitted bed sheet with skirt attached makes this bed more attractive with the bedding decor. Thanks so much!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bed, happy guests
customer_reviews.text: After comparing all the top rated air mattress and reading hundreds of reviews, I always went back to this one, so I bought it. It's very nice, easy to set up and both sets of guests (each stayed more than a week) loved the bed. Even my husband and my kid decided to be guest room squatters for a day because they said the bed was so comfortable, haha. We plan to buy another one for our vacation home.
customer_reviews.author: Marebito

customer_reviews.title: Great product and service with this company
customer_reviews.text: This is just the correct height with the addition of a 2" latex mattress topper. The cover that comes with it fits well and acts as a sheet. The 1st. mattress sent had a slow leak and after I talked with them about it they sent out a replacement. Excellent service! The pump on this thing is fastastic both for filling or emptying. It seems to be very well constructed and I hope to have years of service out of it. They say about 10% of air mattresses have a leak so I'm not bothered by this as it was just my time to be one of the 10%. Overall, very happy with the product and service
customer_reviews.author: Ted M. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great Warranty Service!
customer_reviews.text: This air bed worked fine for me as a "nightly sleeper" up until the 3 month mark, then it developed a very slow leak. Just the nature of the beast, I'm afraid. Anyway, Becky at Airmattress.com didn't drag me through the process of finding the leak, she just arranged to ship me a replacement bed. I wasn't even asked to ship the defective one back. I couldn't ask more than that, given the situation & product was still under warranty!!
customer_reviews.author: UNHAPPY SLEEPER

customer_reviews.title: Sleep problems due to the type of bedding?  You might want to give this bed a try.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic!! First time I have been able to sleep on a bed in nearly 25 years. Have been sleeping in a recliner chair all that time. Have spent many thousands of dollars on conventional beds, adjustable beds, even the high dollar adjustable sleep number ones. All no help with sleeping. Bought this one and a gel memory foam topper and viola, instant good sleep. After a couple of weeks, my body is still adjusting to sleeping on a flat bed instead of a tilted up recliner but I fully expected that. BTW, I have now bought two of these, an extra for second bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Whackmeforsleeping

customer_reviews.title: Not intended for long term usage
customer_reviews.text: Liked that the height was like that of a regular bed, and that you could adjust the firmness or softness to your liking. This unit is not intended for long term usage. It is great to have as a spare bed for that occasional sleepover guest. Your guests will love this mattress and size. The bed skirt is an added nice touch to glam up an air mattress to look like that of a regular bed. Would purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: SylviaSwaby

customer_reviews.title: King size for a lady
customer_reviews.text: The king mattress sleeps very comfortable I've been sleeping on it for 2 weeks and no problems what so ever. I have a queen Aero bed and love it too. I Think this is my favorite great price nice size and the bedskirt adds a nice touch
customer_reviews.author: geri l seigler

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and comfortable mattress!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this mattress to use in our weekend getaway home. We received our bed very quickly and securely packaged. Inflating the bed was very simple, especially with the communication we received after we made the purchase. This bed is so comfortable, but rather firm, so we deflated just a touch. We love the mattress protector/dust ruffle. I added a blanket, under our fitted sheet, as a way to keep from feeling the plastic so easily. We are very comfortable and satisfied with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Like it

customer_reviews.title: Great air mattress and King size!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had this air mattress for about two months. I left it inflated just to see if it will loose air over time. My family used it for a week while they were visiting and together they were about 350 pounds. It has been a month since it was used the air mattress are still holds air and going strong. Will definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany C.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed! I also purchased a 2 inch foam topper which makes it so comfortable. So far we have had no problems but the day after it arrived I received an email from the company. They said to make sure I contact then in the future if I do.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Warnke

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I'm loving this mattress! It is very firm so I added a 3 inch memory foam topper! I got it for the guest room & have been napping on it daily.... I love the skirt that came with it. Looks like a real bed & seems very durable! I think I'll leave it up permanently!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Air Mattress does what is says on the tin
customer_reviews.text: This mattress stayed inflated for the 2 weeks I needed to use it until my bed arrived. I topped it up once after the first night and did not require any further after that. I like the height so you don't feel like you are on the floor as with the other brands I've tried. It is the most comfortable air mattress I have slept on but still would not be a permanent solution for me. The fitted cover is a nice touch with the skirt disguising it and the whole thing comes in a bag for easy storage. Our guests in the future are sure to have a good night sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This bed has served VERY WELL. I am staying in a small apartment for 5 months and couldnt find one furnished. 5 months and two people sleeping on it. No problems! The self inflating feature made it so easy and the bed skirt makes it feel more like home. I added a memory foam topper for extra comfort. Sometimes needs a little more inflation, no leaks, it's just the nature of the material it's made of and it stretches over time.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: completely deformed
customer_reviews.text: i bought the mattress in July. i used it for couple of weeks in July and put it away. i pull the mattress out last week for friends visiting and the mattress is completely deform. i try calling the 800 number of the seller and the phone is not working. the mattress have a 1 year warranty, but i can get in touch with anybody about it. is only being used 2 weeks. is higher in the middle, lower on the sides, the bottom is not flat so it rocks.
customer_reviews.author: luis carlos leon-ponte

customer_reviews.title: Its Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Great looking bed bed skirt cover is a wonderful touch very comfortable minor leak issue resolved very quickly quality product and company
customer_reviews.author: TrumpSucks

customer_reviews.title: U won’t be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am 6 ft 1. 230lbs. I work as a nurse and my commute is over and hour during special events in my city sometimes. On those weekends I use this air mattress at a friends house to avoid the commute. Most comfortable air mattress I’ve have owned.
customer_reviews.author: chance

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: This air bed is considerably better than the competition. Easy to set up, easy to use. Very comfortable to live on.
customer_reviews.author: Bud R

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable mattress and It did not leak or lose air.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for out of town guests and it worked great. Easy to set up, did not leak and looks almost like a regular bed with the bed skirt that was included. It is comfortable and firm, but I plan to buy a memory form topper to make it more comfortable and more like a regular mattress. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Martin

customer_reviews.title: Terrific good bed for the price
customer_reviews.text: No fuss, no muss - Very easy to set up. My wife and I both slept on the bed (King), and we both thought that it sort of, kind of, in an odd way was like a waterbed (not exactly though). The mattress had good support, and didn't seem to lose any air during the first 24 hours. So far I feel like I got a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: James Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, you will love it!
customer_reviews.text: I cant even remember the last time I received a product that was so prompt, well put together and exactly as it was described. My bed recently broke down, bad this time! So in the mean time I decided to - without shame - purchase an air mattress. No complaints by far. My favorite thing about this bed though is the complementary bed skirt!!!!! Wow! Adds the perfect aesthetic to it. Not only does it look good but it is rather comfortable. This company should teach other air mattress companies a thing or two. Because the bed skirt is a YESS!! SUPER PLEASED, THANK YOU!
customer_reviews.author: Renè

customer_reviews.title: Great for guests
customer_reviews.text: Hubby and I camped with it for a week and slept well with plenty of room. The two eight-year-old grandkids LOVE it inside the 6 person tent! It works great when we have company, so I can use the room for crafts at other times. I add a foam barrier for extra cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Revell

customer_reviews.title: Defective and it still gets 5 STARS?
customer_reviews.text: Over a year ago I purchased a California King air mattress from this company and love. My sister is planning to visit me and I need another bed. I decided to let sis use mine so I only needed a twinXL. It arrived on-time but was defective. I called the company and we decided the fastest way to solve my problem was through Amazon. So, two days later another arrived and it's perfect. If you're looking for an air bed... You need to look no further (Likely should have left the defective first one out of this review but wanted to show customer service is also great).
customer_reviews.author: Gary Gilbertson

customer_reviews.title: BEST AIR MATTRESS
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought several air mattresses over the years. Mustn’t for kid sleep overs. Bought this one in Queen last year to use until a new bed could be delivered. BEST air mattress I’ve ever had. Even used it for my 68 year old mom who has a bad back over the holidays and it was great! Buying another one to take over seas.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Has held up very well. Love that motor is inside if mattress and inflates and deflates w motor. Takes only minutes to deflate and inflate. Motor needs a few inches of clearance so I would put at foot of bed. Included mattress skirt is a nice kittle touch. I slept on it for a week and was not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tink4today

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this king sized bed based on customer reviews and Amazon's Choice, couldn't be happier. My son and wife visited and used the bed for 5 nights. They slept comfortably, I added a cushy mattress pad. I've laid down on it myself just to check it out and fell asleep almost immediately. It is fast-inflating and easily adjustable to your comfort level of softness. I highly recommend this bed for either short term or long term. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: gigi bond

customer_reviews.title: I researched for a long time before I bought another ...
customer_reviews.text: I researched for a long time before I bought another blowup bed. The expensive Aerobeds went flat after a couple of years so I tried this brand. I opened it, blew it up and went back to check the next day and it had already lost air. It's impossible to find a leak in a king size airbed. It is used maybe twice a year and now I have to find another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Margie

customer_reviews.title: Yes!  You want this air mattress.
customer_reviews.text: The previous reviews were super helpful in making this decision since there were so many options. Thanks to the previous reviewers! This air mattress is awesome! Less than 4 minutes to inflate & the deflate option is the best! No more worrying about getting all the air out! It was super comfortable (my husband wants me to buy one for home to replace our regular mattress!), large since it was king size (dog fit too!) and no leaks at all. With a heated blanket it was super toasty even with no heat in the house. I am highly recommending! We bought the king size deep pocket sheet set on amazon too. The fitted sheet when almost to the floor!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Owens

customer_reviews.title: as good as a bed
customer_reviews.text: wow put memory foam over it and it is better that a bed. without foam it is still a great bed for guests - better than may futons and sleep sofa's fan to blow it up is slightly loud in that you want to do it before little ones are asleep. fan can be used to take air out which makes for fast put away Small minor complaint: The "fabric" cover they provide stinks like polyester /plastic, until washed once or twice - maybe just dump it and get nice mattress cover / skirt if desired
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: We were flooded in August and lost everything and after three months we are back in our house but have a long way to go . We needed a bed and decided on this one and we love it. We sleep better on this than our other mattress. Thank you! Lisa Theis
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Must Buy
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product and I would totally purchase again. Matter of fact I purchased the product twice because of a small air leak that I could not find. I wasn't aware of the warranty until I received an email for the second purchase. I called the company and explained the situation. The lovely representative refunded my money for the second air mattress and told me to enjoy my replacement! Talk about legendary customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Law Loadholt

customer_reviews.title: You will sleep like a baby!
customer_reviews.text: This Air mattress is not only the best air mattress I have seen or used. It's the best bed I have slept on! It's sturdy and comfy at the same time. Storing it is also very easy and effortless. I inflate it and deflate it every day and have no problems! Ive had the best sleep I had in years on this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great Air Mattress, Great Customer Service. This product more than meets our expectation. The quality of the product is excellent. It looks beautiful. The material seems to be extremely durable. The beds comfortably kept my wife and I (both well over 200 pounds) without losing air (once we made sure that the plug was fully inserted). The sheet/skirt is also of high quality. We have not tried to use the mattresses for camping yet, but they would probably hold up very well there, also.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk

customer_reviews.title: pros vs. cons Thumbs Up
customer_reviews.text: pros: - Built-in Pump - Electrical Cord Stores Nicely - Very Large (3 of us fit on it) cons: - Only 30 day return policy In preparation for a camping trip, my wife purchased this air mattress on 9/29. We went camping yesterday on 10/1 and used the mattress for the first time. Inflating the bed was very easy, just plug into a 120v outlet (inflates in about 2 minutes). The bed was very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: GOSCOPE

customer_reviews.title: Great for unexpected guests
customer_reviews.text: I love that it is raised a bit off the floor and it comes with a lovely dust ruffle. The only drawback is how hard it is to keep sheets on it. It came with a travel bag and we could even take it with us to provide our own bed!
customer_reviews.author: KippersMa

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping like a queen on a king at the Cape.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this KING size for our cape cod vacation. We are a family of four and our young children always end up in our bed and this is perfect! Sturdy, big, and silent! Others mattresses we've tried have sounded like squeaky pool rafts and by morning the air has either redistributed itself or leaked out leaving us on the floor. 100% recommend! We stay at our family's cottage and the beds are old and uncomfortable year after year we dread the sleeping accommodation but never again!
customer_reviews.author: Katie C

customer_reviews.title: Easy to work
customer_reviews.text: I just took it out of the box and straightened it out and plugged it in. I got it for my husband who is in our home that we are selling in Ga while I am in the new House. I could not see him struggle with a pump and not being able to get out. This one you can sit on the side and put your shoes on with. I still have to see how it deflates, but inflate was in 5 mins.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Bennett

customer_reviews.title: so I appreciate how easily it sets up and breaks down for storage
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a guest bed, so I appreciate how easily it sets up and breaks down for storage. The ruffle is a nice touch!
customer_reviews.author: D. Maclay

customer_reviews.title: A 5 star product!😊
customer_reviews.text: We recently purchased thus bed for our 3rd floor bedroom/guest room. We have been pleased and delighted with the presentation the bed makes and its quality. You would never know it was an air mattress! It maintains the air well and is extremely comfortable. It was a definite, positive addition to the room! Happy to reccomend it to anyone who needs an extra bed in a hurry for a short stay, or even longer!
customer_reviews.author: rosa4

customer_reviews.title: Biggest and Best
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I are both over 6 ft and no where near the slim side and this mattress held up to its word in the 3 weeks we had to use it we only had to put a small amount of air in it maybe 4 times this was definitely a bang for my buck!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Air mattress
customer_reviews.text: It comes with everything you need and so very simple to get set up. Shipping was spot on. Quality is great, you can even adjust the firmness level. The customer service can't be beat! They stand behind their products 110%!
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this mattress. I slept on it until I bought my regular bed and mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Hawkes

customer_reviews.title: Really doesn’t leak
customer_reviews.text: Bought this assuming we would have to add air every few nights, but we have had it for a month, and used it mostly on the weekends, and haven’t had to add air yet. Comfort wise is certainly isn’t as good an inner spring mattress, but it’s way better than al;l the other air mattresses I have used over the years.
customer_reviews.author: PhotoBubba

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. Great comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Even though the mattress rests on the floor, the height is more than adequate; at least twice the height of regular blowup mattress. It's almost like sleeping in a regular bed. It is firm and comfortable and will allow even your heaviest sister-in-law to get a good nights sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Quality sleep.
customer_reviews.text: Better than most I have purchased. Better quality noticed right out of the box, Different feel than Intex. I am 6'3" 285 lbs and I feel lost on the bed. It is very welcomed. No loss of air, mild reduction due to temp. Set up is easy. You will need to make sure you have the roo. It is a true king. Enjoy
customer_reviews.author: Rev. Marc Baisden

customer_reviews.title: Bed leaked air within the first month I owned it
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I purchased this bed from amazon on February 22nd, 2018. I used the bed roughly 4 times since I purchased it. I had no issue the first three times. The last time I used the bed however, it slowly leaked air throughout the night and was semi-deflated. I tested it again by inflating it again, fully and letting it sit out for a few hours. Again, it slowly leaked air and semi-deflated. I liked the bed when it didn't leak. I contacted the manufacture to see if they could replace the bed for me since I purchased it on February 22nd? We will see. Thanks, Nick DiDario
customer_reviews.author: Nick DiDario

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, sturdy, high bed with a lot of extras
customer_reviews.text: After looking into a lot of air matresses online. This one had the most stars and best reviews. I was about to spend more money on a air matress from costco and it doesnt even compare i have tried both. The price can't be beat. It does come with skirts and bamboo cover. Very easy to pump and use pump to deflate as well. Overall very happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: Juan Pablo Mego Cuellar

customer_reviews.title: Best sleep and durability.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this bed for 2 months using it daily. I'm not light either. 240lbs. Stays inflated for at least a week if not 10 days before turning pump on for let's say 15 seconds... feels like a real bed. I sleep quite comfortable. Especially since I have owned a pillow top actual mattress. No neck or back pains. Great height. Like a bed and box spring. Unless you want to be super high up... your choice. Great material. One of the only air mattresses that is easy to fold and put back in bag. Say for guests. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Gellis

customer_reviews.title: A raised air mattress that really works.
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I wanted as the bed was raised for older people. I have used the bed 3 times with each time deflating and reflating each time and have had no issues. The bed has been slept on by guest and my son and both have said it was a great sleep. I have used many air mattress in the past and mostly they are so hard to sleep on but this one is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: G Pendley

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for when my parents visit. They usually come for 2 to 3 weeks at a time. They love it!! It has plenty of room! Tall enough, yet short enough for them to get in and out of. Very comfortable. Not to hot and not to cold. Seems very durable. My parents are VERY picky and they just loved it! I have purchases at least 6 air matresses in my life this is by far the best!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customed

customer_reviews.title: Well made comfy.. sheet doesnt stay on.
customer_reviews.text: Ease of use. It is tall easier to get out of with bad knees. However the sheet is a bit misleading.. it looks nice but doesnt stay put. So we put regular sheet on is better so tonight I will put a sheet on bottom and top and see corners together. Nothing will stay on. As we are using as temporary bed while out house is being fixed due to hot water tank leak. So I'd give it a solid 5 if not for a sheet that stays on.. it should come with a zippered sheet that fits all around it.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t inflate a lot if you prefer softer mattress
customer_reviews.text: Needed for a few months sharing a condo until family could move. Better than sleeping on hard wood floors. Too firm but I inflated it that way. Held air a good long time w/ouch leakage at all. Plug and inflate...couldn’t be easier. In storage for guest use now. And cover was a huge boon!
customer_reviews.author: Michele T. Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Great air bed!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this inflatable bed (it honestly feels like a bed not a mattress). It’s super easy to assemble. Yes, makes a horrendous noise when inflated. Yes, smells when you take it straight from the box, but smells desolves within few hours. But also it is super comfortable. We used it for two weeks straight, there was almost no need to add any air (we might have done twice and honestly such a small amounts). It honestly looks like a bed and is as comfortable as one. I’m taking a star away for a noise (it is loud to inflate) and for a the seller for pesting me with review emails in first two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Kamila

customer_reviews.title: Firm, large, reasonably priced air mattress
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a firm durable air mattress, look no further. I was looking for something that could be used for long periods of time but can be deflated and inflated every day. This mattress has held up and the king size is what makes it even better. If you like a very firm mattress this is for you. Personally I like it a little softer but it’s solved with a thick velvet blanket on top until I get a mattress topper. Firm, large, reasonably priced air mattresses are hard to come by.
customer_reviews.author: Chantilly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our needs
customer_reviews.text: We bought this air mattress for our new home. We are moving to a new area and our furniture was not due to be deliveredfor4 days but wanted to stay in the house rather than spend money to stay in a hotel. The mattress is great to sleep on with both my husband and myself in a king. The cover is great and hangs down like a bed skirt. It is a bargain, easy to inflat, comfortable and sturdy. It is as good or better than any other more expensive brands.
customer_reviews.author: gayle c hall

customer_reviews.title: Finally a full size air mattress
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to find a tall, full size air mattress. I bought this one two weeks ago and so far so good. My friend is visiting from out of town and staying with me for nine nights. She slept on it about 4 times and she liked it. It lost a little air but the seller says is normal but still the bed is firm. I put sheepskin blanket for more support and on top of it, I used the sheet-skirt that comes with the bed. It is about 20" tall and the size is perfect. I deflate it once and it was hard to get rid off the air and fold it. Maybe I'm not doing it right.
customer_reviews.author: gugu

customer_reviews.title: We are well pleased with purshase.
customer_reviews.text: We slept on it for the first time last night. Pulled it out of box, plugged it in and turned on pump to blow it up. Bed was firm and we both slept good. It appears to be well made. Also like that it is a full king size bed so regular king size bed sheets fit it good. Update - We slept on it for a month with no problems. My back loved it. I would buy it again if I needed another air bed.
customer_reviews.author: Leon

customer_reviews.title: Finally After Buying Cheaper Air Beds
customer_reviews.text: This is the only air bed that actually holds it's air the correct way. I like firm beds and this one is firm. If you like softer beds, just add a layer of memory foam. It is worth paying the extra money to get an air bed like this that holds air. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: L Ann Myers

customer_reviews.title: Air mattress meets its advertised benefits
customer_reviews.text: Although the air mattress has been used briefly so far, it inflated smoothly and relatively quickly and was easily adjustable for the relative comfort an air mattress can provide. It is somewhat higher off the ground than other mattresses and most others don't seem to have a "king" option, which is what we purchased. It took a mattress pad well and could easily hold other layers of comfort options if desired. We gave it to our daughter for use in a vacation home to be used by us and other guests if needed. Material seems sturdy. Easy to store and not too bulky or heavy to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Demler

customer_reviews.title: All in all a really good mattress
customer_reviews.text: Used it so far for one weekend of camping. With my girlfriend and I and our 2 dogs we decided to go up from a queen. This air mattress held up really well. My girlfriend decided to add an extra pillow top mattress pad and that was a good idea since we need to have it blown kinda hard so I wouldn’t feel like I was going to roll off in the middle of the night. We can’t seem to get it back in the bag properly, and the drawstring from the bag broke already too. All in all it’s really good quality air mattress, and we’ll see how it holds up for a lot more camping trips.
customer_reviews.author: Carman

customer_reviews.title: At first we love the product
customer_reviews.text: At first we love the product. The Bed inflated perfectly and was comfortable to use it. After a month of use, we found that the center of the bed start to bulge out which makes it extremely uncomfortable to use it and start to have body pain. We are unable to return it because this happen right after a week after the return period closure.
customer_reviews.author: Gino George

customer_reviews.title: It"s easy to inflate and deflate and they said it was ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this when the grandkids spend the night. It"s easy to inflate and deflate and they said it was more comfortable than their bed at home. Pretty high praise from a 9 year old to notice the difference and acknowledge it.
customer_reviews.author: Bouguereau01

customer_reviews.title: Ok bed for short term
customer_reviews.text: Good for short term use. Hard and uncomfortable, smells at first but goes away within about a week. Wash everything before use.
customer_reviews.author: Momof632

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic air mattress!! I usually dread sleeping on an air mattress, but honestly this one changed my opinion completely!! It took less than 5 minutes to inflate, was very comfortable and stayed firm and fully inflated for 2 full days. The motor ensures that every bit of air comes out of the mattress which made it very easy to fold up and store. I love this so much I am planning to buy one as a gift for a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Tara O.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product backed by great customer support
customer_reviews.text: The full size mattress was exactly what I needed! it inflated quickly, at first I thought it was loosing air, but working with the Fox Webstores customer support a replacement was provided and it it worked flawlessly! Deflation was a breeze and is compact to store. Excellent product and customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Sue W.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and comforable.
customer_reviews.text: I really do like this bed. My husband is unable to climb stairs to our bedroom so we use this in the middle of the living room instead. The only problem is that the edges of the bed are so much softer than the larger middle part. Also, it would be helpful if I knew how much air to put in it. I was hoping it would have and automatic shutoff when it got too full. If it does, I haven't seen any mention of it in the literature with it. Otherwise is is very easy to install and comfortable to sleep on.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Hoyle

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This mattress has its own pump. It both deflates and inflates pretty quickly. It's a noisy process but wasn't too bad. The pictures make it look like the cover with bedsheet is a little thicker than it actually is and it doesn't drape to the floor. However I got a good night's sleep which is the most important thing.
customer_reviews.author: Collierisms

customer_reviews.title: Lovely bed
customer_reviews.text: Update** Had the defective bed replaced and new bed is holding up great! Don't mind the bump that you see... I used my old memory foam topper and it's for a queen size while the air bed is king. I'd highly recommend some type of topper on the bed.
customer_reviews.author: cesar c.

customer_reviews.title: Ease of set up
customer_reviews.text: I have not slept on it yet that's why only 4stars. Have family coming in a few weeks will let you know then how satisfied I am. It's easy to put up and take down. It does go back into the bag
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Works for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for about a year now and it has saved me many sleepless nights in smaller beds or floors. We had to travel a lot because of an ailing parent. The bed worked perfectly. I have it set up in a spare bedroom now, you need to put a mattress pad or something over the top for extra comfort, but have had no issues with air leakage and is easy to put up and down.
customer_reviews.author: Traci A. Donahue

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot. The reason I did not give it a 5 star rating: it sucks the heat out of your body. They should warn it about that (like in the old days when you slept on a water bed without a heater). The first night, I was cold- not from the ambiant air but from the matterss. The next day, I went to Walmart and bought a $20 mattress cover. Bingo. Now, I'm warm and comfy!!! 5 star, finally.
customer_reviews.author: Gil Marcotte

customer_reviews.title: Dependability and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Very surprised that the quality and ease of putting it up. Sleeps good and easy to add or remove air from mattress with a twist of the knob. My grandchildren love it as well. Highly recommend this product. Of course I am a very pickie person. Easy to please but I want what I pay for with great customer service. I must admit the customer service was on top of things before I even had a chance to use the mattress. But again, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: shirley spencer

customer_reviews.title: Portable blow up mattress
customer_reviews.text: Product is perfect for traveling or out of town guest. Love the mattress cover however I would prefer something a little softer on the top. Otherwise a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: I think this is very nice. It set up easily, seems comfortable (I didn't sleep on it but lied down to test it) and the bed skirt that comes with it seems pretty nice and durable. I wish it was a little higher off the ground but that is my only criticism.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most comfy air mattress I've ever slept on. Had ...
customer_reviews.text: Most comfy air mattress I've ever slept on. Had to fill it after sleeping a couple differ times just because it expands as you use it, otherwise it does not lose air!!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Merchant

customer_reviews.title: Not puncture proof!
customer_reviews.text: Super impressed with the quality and durability. We are in the process of moving cross country and this is the only furniture we have so we have spent a lot of time of this product. The fitted sheet is super soft and comfortable and the mattress although feels like a air mattress it is much more comfortable than it's competitors. The reviews about this product are true , unfortunately the product was not meant for two dogs and after two weeks of use my dogs have managed to puncture it so it won't hold air. Super sad that the dogs damaged such a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Eryn

customer_reviews.title: Holding up good
customer_reviews.text: The pump works great and fast whether filling or emptying. We left it full for about six weeks, not using, and it didn't seem to lose any air. When I use it for several days in a row, I usually have to add about 20 seconds of air after about 5 days. I'm impressed and another couple that borrowed it for a two day use was also. I would buy another of these if I ever needed anything similar.
customer_reviews.author: Allan R. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Just because product does not stick by the sellers word it's really no good at all
customer_reviews.text: I am pissed off I bought this airbed on July 25 2018 I thought it would like last not even 2 months later it has a hole and is deflated we cannot find the hole it doesn't ring true if u pay for something and it's priced higher you don't always get what you pay for I'm am very upset I spend 150$ on an air mattress and it only lasted 1. 1/2 months I would not recommend this product to anyone
customer_reviews.author: redhotmama777

customer_reviews.title: Inflatable air mattress.
customer_reviews.text: I did like the air mattress. It is cold the sleep on. Needs a comforter under you to help keep you warm. It does deflate a bit over time but it is easy to add air when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Mustone

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT stay fully inflated.
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two twin XL mattresses. They looked very nice. They inflate nicely but did NOT stay firm for more than a few hours. BOTH mattresses lost air pressure after a few hours. I suspect something related to the pump is causing a loss of air pressure. Online chat with airmatterss.com produced NO satisfaction. The customer service person seemed to be in denial. Both brand new mattresses and continued to leak after several air additions of air pressure for two days. We did not use them because of this defect. They were repacked and returned in the original boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Paul W. Wittmer Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great for grandkids
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 twin mattresses to use when our grandkids visit. The kids enjoy inflating them, and the mattresses instantly convert a home office into a guest bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Easy to inflate
customer_reviews.text: Best part about this is that it inflated and deflated with a flip of a switch. Worth it
customer_reviews.author: ASands

product_meta.title: Air Mattress Twin Size - Best Choice Raised Inflatable Bed with Fitted Sheet and Bed Skirt - Built-in High Capacity Airbed Pump
feature_bullets: ✅ NO-HASSLE WARRANTY - Your purchase includes a 1-year WARRANTY and a 60-day RISK-FREE SATISFACTION GUARANTEE. If you're not completely thrilled with your air mattress, send it back for a full refund, no questions asked. We'll even pay for return shipping for the air mattress twin.

✅ NO MORE BACK PAIN - Read the reviews of the Best Choice Air Mattress. You'll find that people are thrilled with the firmness of this air bed. Other inflatable beds will collapse or stretch, which offers no support for your joints. With the laminated material of the Best Choice, we have solved that problem. It not only offers a firm sleeping surface, but it also makes for a very sturdy air mattress on the edges as well.

✅ BEST LOOKING AIR MATTRESS - No one will argue, The Best Choice is in fact, the best-looking air mattress out there. The stylish bed skirt and fitted top sheet is much more than a fashion statement; it provides a critical layer between you and the bed. This will keep you much warmer and keep you sleeping much deeper.

✅ GETTING GOOD SLEEP IS ALL ABOUT BACK SUPPORT - This is the firmest raised inflatable bed out there, offering second to none back support. So many positive feedback letting us know how it has helped their back from hurting. We've even had customers suggest putting a simple pillow topper on top, "making it the most comfortable bed in the world". Or, our favorite quote, "My hip doesn't hurt anymore like when I sleep on my $1500.00 mattress".

✅ IF IT LEAKS, IT'S WORTHLESS - We understand this very well. That is why we spend extra on the material. Laminated vinyl prevents the air bed from stretching too much. It is the seams of an air mattress that will break down and start to leak. Preventing the seams from over stretching will prolong the life of your air mattress. So much so, you can expect your bed to last twice as long as a regular vinyl product. You can also put over 300 lbs. on a raised air mattress twin.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars2,317 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
